basics.name: Reynaldo Jacobo
basics.label: Ruby on Rails Web Developer
basics.summary: I'm a person who likes to learn new things, including new programming languages and different ways to apply logic to web development.I have worked as a web developer at the University of Colima, in the department of General Management of Planning and Institutional Development, expanding my knowledge in the area of web programming.I participated in the courses taught by BrightCoders Academy where I developed my skills better and learned to use new technologies.

work.summary: Participate in the 'Donadores Compulsivos' project with a team. I was supporting the front-end team with Ruby On Rails technology.

work.company: General Direction of Planning and Institutional Development at the University of Colima
work.summary: I provided my services to carry out the constitutional service of the UdeC in the department of General Direction of Planning and Institutional Development.

awards.title: 5th National Colloquium on Educational Research
awards.awarder: General Direction of Planning and Institutional Development at the University of Colima
awards.summary: For giving the lecture: 'Information systems for educational planning through statistical indicators'

awards.title: Proof of constitutional social service.
awards.awarder: General Direction of Planning and Institutional Development at the University of Colima
awards.summary: For providing the Constitutional Social Service in Coordination of Planning and Institutional Development at the University of Colima
